description:
This desktop picture changes throughout the day, based on your location.
---
Transplanted macOS 11 BigSur Day/Night Dynamic Wallpaper
5K Resolution (5120 x 2880)
Both dynamic mode & static mode are supported
Dynamic mode:
- Image changes according to sunrise and sunset time with animation
- Sunrise and sunset time can be automatically fetched from internet or set manually
- Animation duration is adjustable
Static mode:
- All 8 images available
---
Notes:
- Internet-based location detection might not be functional under some network conditions and in some regions
- To make your own dynamic wallpaper, visit github page for codes: https://github.com/Yaindrop/DynamicWallpaper
- Original from Yaindrop
title: macOS BigSur Day/Night (1.3)
